discoveryMode: You are currently in Discovery mode. To access AI products offered by OVHcloud, you need to activate your project.
authDescription: To use OVHcloud AI services, you will need to authenticate before you can create your first notebook, job or app.
cliParagraphe1: Use our ovhai interface to access and manage your notebooks, jobs and applications in command lines (CLI).
cliParagraphe2: Select the region you want to use:
alertCli: Be sure to restart your terminal so that you can use ovhai.
cliParagraphe3: Authentication on the platform can be done via all
cliParagraphe3Ter: configured within the same Public Cloud project.
cliParagraphe4: The authentication steps are as follows:
cliList2: select the authentication type in the terminal or via browser
cliList3: enter the login details for the user you want to connect to, or enter the associated token
cliCommandParagraphe1Bis: to get a list of available actions.
reversibilityDescription: OVHcloud takes sovereignty and freedom of personal data very seriously. You can recover your data at any time using standard protocols.
calculationDescription: With industrialized datacentres and automated deployments, OVHcloud offers high computing capacity at the best price for data analytics.
securityDescription: As a cloud provider responsible for hosting personal data, our commitment involves respecting data confidentiality.
conformityDescription: Our cloud infrastructures and services are certified ISO/IEC 27001, 27017, 27018 and 27701. With our health data hosting (HDS) certification, you can host French healthcare data securely.
openSourceDescription: In the world of data, open-source solutions are now the most mature, high-performance offerings. OVHcloud values the importance of basing its solutions on open-source software, such as the Apache Hadoop and Apache Spark suites.
